posts.raw_content:
For context, CA started giving free Medicaid to illegals under 26 since 2016, then [expanded it to over 50 in 2022](https://www.gov.ca.gov/2021/07/27/governor-newsom-signs-into-law-first-in-the-nation-expansion-of-medi-cal-to-undocumented-californians-age-50-and-over-bold-initiatives-to-advance-more-equitable-and-prevention-focused-health-care/
), and then fully expanded to cover the remaining gap in 2024. Enrollment skyrocketed, far beyond what they predicted, to the tune of $10.8 billion this year - and they requested reimbursement from the federal taxpayer, which Biden's CMS gladly handed out. Hakeem Jeffries going on TV saying that ["illegals already can't get healthcare"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eC-w4BkB4oc) is a flat out lie, but shouldn't be surprising to anyone here.


Back in May, and likely earlier, the CA Legislative Analyst's Office already knew from 2024 figures that the spending was unsustainable. [(Source here, see page 7.)](https://lao.ca.gov/handouts/health/2025/Medi-Cal-in-the-May-Revision-051925.pdf) They made a number of proposals to cut back, including stopping enrollment of new illegals into Medicaid, but also cutting off some citizen seniors, and pharmacy benefits. 


Newsom signed off the budget in June. In other words, they were going to lose healthcare, regardless of the BBB. The illegals, seniors, and those who needed drugs, became SCREWED. And yet, the letters announcing the benefit changes didn't get sent till October. Why? So it looks like it's somehow Trump's fault, or the result of the BBB. Their fanbase is riled up and ready to march, all based on a lie.


California had been laundering money thru what they called the "MCO tax" on insurance companies (which didn't actually pay a dime), which the feds had previously reimbursed. Other states were doing the same thing. [Trump recently closed the loophole.](https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/WFTCA-Illegal-Immigrant-Healthcare-Memo-FINAL.pdf)


This is what the shutdown is about. Those health companies are about to lose a lot of government (Medicaid) contracts, worth billions. They created a problem, then manipulate the situation to blame Trump - at the expense of the people.


The Obamacare subsidies (which are set to expire) will drive up rates for everyone - even you reading this, assuming you have any sort of insurance, even private. It was an artificial way of masking a growing problem. I expect that the money will be taken from illegals and reallocated to replace the expiring subsidy, but that's just my guess.


I suppose none of this should be surprising to anyone here, but this shit really grinds my gears and I needed to vent. TBF there's quite a lot of sensationalism and fake news on PDW, but I did the digging and the fraud is quite real. If anything, the sources linked above (straight from the horse's mouth btw, i.e. CA state gov) should give a better understanding of what's actually going on, behind the headlines. Thank you for coming to my TED talk.

posts.raw_content:
I've seen true, heartfelt prayer requests from our people here... and I've seen us humbly pray to our God and our Lord.  I send a prayer up with every request I see.  I never thought that I would be asking for some though.

Some background: our daughter hasn't been eating or feeling the same during the past few months.  My wife said that middle school is tough for girls (and boys IIRC), but we haven't noticed anything besides the food intake and attitude change.  We keep a close eye on our kids, from what they watch to who they hang out with.  We try to be as involved as possible.  We must have missed this though, as it was a month or so until we started asking questions.  I'm hopeful that she can fight this disorder... I myself suffer from OCD.  I was diagnosed in my twenties, so I was older, but I remember how tough it was.

Regarding my job: I've been looking for a full-time job since way before my last contract expired on June 30th.  I had a bunch of interviews, but nothing worked.  Its a real, real strange job market... almost like employers don't want to take chances with anyone.  I eventually found employment, but within a week or two I realized the company was in it just for the money... profits over people all the time.  I started looking for my next position, but my employer took the next step first and amicably separated from me last Friday.  I wasn't too disappointed, as I couldn't stand working there and was very unsatisfied, but i wanted to wait until I found something else.

I mention the dishwasher only because, even with all the sadness and uncertainty we're dealing with, I still try and find positivity and humor in life.  So, yes, our dishwasher is leaking like a SOB and refuses to wash my dishes.... can you believe it?!  To add some more drama, our kitchen faucet also gave up last week.  However, we now have a wonderful bigger, nicer faucet, so there's that.

So, I humbly and prayerfully ask all y'all to pray for my daughter and my family.  May God Bless her with health and peace and happiness.  Please Lord, help me find a good job, where I can help people and lead others to Your path of Truth and Spirit.  And please guide us in purchasing a new dishwasher (its OK to laugh at that part).

May the Lord Bless and keep all those who are reading this.  Thank you for your time, your toughts, and your prayers.

Glory be to the Father, and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit. 
As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be, world without end.  Amen.
posts.author: Nezock_theKnight
posts.title: Please pray for my family, magadonians... daughter is in hospital for anorexia, and its been really tough on the family.  I also lost my job.  And the dishwasher broke...

An event aimed at disrupting civil society, funded by foreign enemies of America is about to happen in multiple population centers.

Fuck optics. Fuck speaking softly and carrying the big stick. Time to start using the big stick to smash skulls. 

We are on the verge of a civil war. An internal conflict is a necessity at this point and a moral imperative - either the United States remains the bastion of White Christian Civilization, or we become an afro-chicano-latino-spanish speaking third world shithole. But it can be done without a full scale war.

Deploy the troops, shoot a few hundred, maybe a few thousand, and arrest a few thousand more and ship them to CECOT or Africa. Put the fear of God into the rest of the subversives. 

This is the time.
